unnormalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to A Grade!
normalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to A Grade!

unnormalised: Hey students! Diwali's around the corner and what better gift than funding your education? Scholarship portals are booming, offering a simplified way to find and apply for financial aid. Think of them as the Zomato of scholarships – endless options at your fingertips!
normalised: Hey students! Diwali's around the corner and what better gift than funding your education? Scholarship portals are booming, offering a simplified way to find and apply for financial aid. Think of them as the Zomato of scholarships – endless options at your fingertips!

unnormalised: Instead of sifting through individual college websites (like IIT Delhi or Mumbai University), these portals consolidate everything. Many even offer personalized recommendations based on your profile, academic performance (got that 90% in Class 12?), and interests.
normalised: Instead of sifting through individual college websites (like I I T Delhi or Mumbai University), these portals consolidate everything. Many even offer personalized recommendations based on your profile, academic performance (got that ninety percent in Class twelve?), and interests.

unnormalised: From merit-based to need-based, there's something for everyone. Some even offer scholarships specifically for students from smaller towns in Uttar Pradesh! Think of the delicious biryani you could buy with that extra Rs. 10,000!
normalised: From merit-based to need-based, there's something for everyone. Some even offer scholarships specifically for students from smaller towns in Uttar Pradesh! Think of the delicious biryani you could buy with that extra rupee ten thousand!

unnormalised: So, this festive season, ditch the stress and explore these portals. Your academic journey might just get a whole lot easier (and cheaper!). Don't wait, some deadlines are closing soon!
normalised: So, this festive season, ditch the stress and explore these portals. Your academic journey might just get a whole lot easier (and cheaper!). Don't wait, some deadlines are closing soon!
